text: General of the Army Anatoly Vasiliyevich Kvashnin (; 15 August 1946 â€“ 7 January 2022) was a Russian general. He was the Chief of the Russian General Staff from 1997 to 2004. Kvashnin died from COVID-19 on 7 January 2022 in Moscow, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian generals Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow
title: Anatoly Kvashnin
